section.title: Backup and Recovery
section.para: CMM does not offer integrated backup and recovery mechanisms. Use the standard file system mechanisms instead.
It is recommended that you create a regular backup of the configuration files:

listitem.para: The configuration files of the Metrics Agent located in the /etc/monasca/agent directory.
The configuration file of the Log Agent located in the /etc/monasca/monasca-log-agent directory.

section.para: The frequency of backups depends on the amount of configuration changes.
If you need to recover your agent installation, the recommended procedure is as follows:

listitem.para: Uninstall the agent. For details, refer to .
Reinstall the agent. For details on the Metrics Agent, refer to . For details on the Log Agent, refer to .
Copy the backup of your configuration files to the /etc/monasca/agent or the /etc/monasca/monasca-log-agent directory, respectively.
